name: Surviball (Alika Studios)
description:
Defend your goal, compete against a nearly perfect AI and get the highest score possible to appear on the Online Leaderboard in this hardcore arcade game!!

The more balls you stop and the longer you survive the more points you will get at the end of the game.

Get the highest score possible on any of the maps to get your nickname appear on the "Online Leaderboard" and brag about it with your friends!!

GAME FEATURES:

• 36 playable maps: 

         - 12 unique maps

         - 3 variations of each map

• 8 unique keepers

• Online Leaderboard
